question: Which of the following are JavaScript frameworks or libraries?
description: React and Angular are popular JavaScript frameworks/libraries used for building user interfaces. Python and Java are programming languages, not JavaScript frameworks.

question: Which HTML5 tags are used for semantic structuring?
description: header and article are semantic HTML5 tags that give meaning to the structure of content. div and span are generic container elements without semantic meaning.

question: Which of these are valid CSS selectors?
description: All of these are valid CSS selectors. #header selects an element with id='header', .content selects elements with class='content', and body>p selects all p elements that are direct children of the body element.

question: Which of these are features of HTML5?
description: Canvas, Local Storage, and Geolocation are all features introduced or standardized in HTML5.

question: Which methods can be used to add an element to the DOM in JavaScript?
description: appendChild() adds a node to the end of the list of children of a specified parent node. insertBefore() inserts a node before a reference node as a child of a specified parent node. createElement() creates a new element with the specified tag name. replaceChild() replaces one child node of the specified node with another.
